references: Related: CF 272619, Ord 92580, Ord 94559, Ord 94683, Ord 96635, Ord 97089. Repealing: Ord 98405.
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to Urban Renewal; authorizing the Director of Community Development, his Assistant or his Program Administration Director to approve vouchers for the disbursement of Urban Renewal funds under Ordinances 92580, 94559, 94683, 96635 and 97089, superseding said Ordinances to the extent inconsistent, and repealing Ordinance 98405.
